title: AM Prep-Music
maintext:
KANYE WEST RELEASES NEW VIDEO
NEW YORK (AP) — For Kanye West fans, it was a present they didn’t have to rush out to the shopping mall for. The rapper has dropped a new music video. The Thanksgiving Day release is titled “Closed on Sunday” — his visual look at one of the tracks on his latest project, “Jesus Is King.”
KACEY MUSGRAVES STREAMING HOLIDAY SPECIAL ON AMAZON
UNDATED (AP) — No need for you to wait to see Kacey Musgraves get into the holiday spirit. Her holiday special is already available — streaming on Amazon. “The Kacey Musgraves Christmas Show” features the singer-songwriter doing a salute of her favorite holiday specials of years past. Joining her in the effort are Lana Del Rey, Camila Cabello, James Corden and the Radio City Music Hall Rockettes.
JOHN LEGEND CHRISTMAS SHOW SET FOR SUNDAY
UNDATED (AP) — John Legend will be appearing on a number of holiday specials this year. One of them will be on Sunday. In the special “Christmas Under the Stars,” the singer will perform classics like “Silver Bells” and “My Favorite Things” — as well as some of his own tunes, like “All of Me.” The show was taped in Utah — and will air on BYUtv.
